sense.gloss: far and away the best, the very best, cream of the crop, crème de la crème, decisive lead, commanding lead

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はチームで|ダントツ|の↑好↑↓こう↓↑選手↑↓せんしゅ↓だ。
sdata.e: He is by far the best player on the team.

sdata.j: メアリーはこれまでに↑会↑↓あ↓った↑女性↑↓じょせい↓の↑中↑↓なか↓でも|ダントツ|にきれいだよ。
sdata.e: Mary is one of the most beautiful women I've ever met.
